username.AE: Username must be alphanumeric & atleast 5 characters
username.IN: Username must have atleast 6 characters & have one '@' or '_'
username.SA: Username must be alphanumeric & atleast 6 characters & have 1 number
username.EG: Username must be alphanumeric & atleast 9 characters

errors.password: Password must be alphanumeric & atleast 8 characters
